identity.name: E1
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix disparate disciplines.
Emotion First: Every pixel must evoke trust and ambition.
Content is King: Data must be legible and actionable.
Zoom In: Focus on the details that matter (metrics, goals).
Negative Space: Use it to create breathing room.
Contrast: High contrast for readability and impact.

project.name: Vanguard MLM Redesign
project.theme: Light Mode (Primary) with Deep Blue Accents

primary.description: Deep Navy/Slate for Sidebar and Headings. Commands authority.

brand.description: Vibrant Royal Blue for Actions, Links, and Progress. Represents trust and growth.

success.description: Emerald Green for positive financial metrics and growth.

warning.description: Amber/Gold for bonuses, rankings, and alerts.

background.description: Clean white/slate-50 background. Sidebar is dark for contrast.

rules: Use 'brand.main' for primary buttons and active states.
Use 'brand.subtle' for hover backgrounds on light surfaces.
Headings use Manrope. Body uses Inter.
Stats numbers (e.g., $1,200) should be large (text-3xl or 4xl) and 'font-heading'.

sections.name: Profile Header
sections.style: p-6 border-b border-slate-800 flex flex-col items-center text-center

sections.name: Navigation
sections.item_style: flex items-center px-4 py-3 rounded-lg hover:bg-slate-800 transition-colors text-sm font-medium

card.header: px-6 py-4 border-b border-slate-50 flex justify-between items-center

stat_card.style: flex flex-col p-6 bg-white rounded-xl shadow-sm border border-slate-100 hover:border-blue-100 transition-colors
elements: Icon (p-3 rounded-lg bg-blue-50 text-blue-600 mb-4 w-fit)
Trend (text-xs font-medium text-emerald-600 flex items-center mt-1)

button.primary: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-medium py-2.5 px-5 rounded-lg shadow-sm hover:shadow transition-all active:scale-95
button.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 font-medium py-2.5 px-5 rounded-lg transition-colors
button.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:bg-slate-100 hover:text-slate-900 font-medium py-2 px-4 rounded-lg transition-colors

setup: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the new color palette (brand, sidebar, etc.).
Create a 'Sidebar' component in 'src/components/layout/Sidebar.jsx' following the fixed design.
Create a 'Layout' component that wraps pages with the Sidebar.
implementation_order: 3. Create Dashboard Page with Stat Cards and Charts (use Recharts or mock charts).
4. Create Shop Page using the product images.
5. Ensure responsive design: Sidebar becomes a drawer/hamburger menu on mobile.
critical_rules: Sidebar MUST be fixed on the left for desktop.
Profile picture MUST be in the sidebar top-left.
Do not use gradients for backgrounds, keep it clean white/slate.

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. Use the Dashboard Grid.
Micro-animations: Add hover states to all sidebar links and cards.
Spacing: Use 'gap-6' or 'gap-8' for grids. Don't cram content.
Shadows: Use soft, diffuse shadows. No harsh black shadows.
Glassmorphism: Use it sparingly, maybe only for the mobile menu overlay.
